channel.title: Aurora Warms the Night
channel.description: Posts from Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Homelessness has become an epidemic and smaller non-profits like...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is in East Colfax.

Homelessness has become an epidemic and smaller non-profits like Aurora Warms the Night are struggling to keep up. Your donation is incredibly significant as we continue to keep people warms and safe during these winter months. http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html #Homeless #donor

East ColfaxNeighborhood · Denver1,686 people checked in here
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a transport van for food and other supplies. Any support is greatly appreciated.
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: With the homeless population nearly double what it was last...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

With the homeless population nearly double what it was last year, funding from donors is our only hope to keep up with the massive needs on the streets of East Colfax. As the year comes to an end your donation is lifechanging for our homeless friends. Thank you for your support! #Homeless #donate http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a transport van for food and other supplies. Any support is greatly appreciated.
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Wow! This outpouring of donations has been incredible! Thank you...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Wow! This outpouring of donations has been incredible! Thank you to everyone who contributed! #homeless #donate

item.title: We are desperately looking for a donated vehicle to tow our...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are desperately looking for a donated vehicle to tow our shower trailer. Your donation will provide much needed shower services to the homeless community on East Colfax. Call today (303) 343-0537 #homeless #donatenow https://bit.ly/3IKrrbG
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: It's Colorado Gives Day!! Thank you for your continued...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

It's Colorado Gives Day!! Thank you for your continued support. Donate Here: https://www.coloradogives.org/AuroraWarmstheNight/overview…

MAILING and DONATION DROP OFF ADDRESS:
9360 E Colfax Ave.
Aurora, CO 80010

Open: Mon - Thurs 9:30 - 2pm
For donations outside of these hours please call 303-343-0537 to schedule another time.

Aurora Warms the Night

MAILING and DONATION DROP OFF ADDRESS: 9360 E Colfax Ave. Aurora, CO 80010 Open: Mon - Thurs 9:30 - 2pm For donations outside of these hours please call 303-343-0537 to schedule another time.Call nowMAILING and DONATION DROP OFF ADDRESS:
9360 E Colfax Ave.
Aurora, CO 80010

Open: Mon - Thurs 9:30 - 2pm
For donations outside of these hours please call 303-343-0537 to schedule another time.

item.title: Don't forget - Colorado Givesday is tomorrow! Don't...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is asking for donations.

Don't forget - Colorado Givesday is tomorrow! Don't forget Aurora Wamrs the Night in your giving for 2021. #homeless #homelessness #eastcolfax https://www.coloradogives.org/AuroraWarmstheNight/overview…

Donate
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Colorado Gives Day is tomorrow! Don't forget to donate to...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Colorado Gives Day is tomorrow! Don't forget to donate to Aurora Warms the Night in your giving for 2021. Homelessness is at an all-time high and every penny helps save lives. https://www.coloradogives.org/AuroraWarmstheNight/overview…
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: It's Giving Tuesday! Please consider donating to AWTN so we...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is asking for donations.

It's Giving Tuesday! Please consider donating to AWTN so we can continue to make a difference in the homeless community in Aurora. We couldn't do what we do without all of you!
http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html

Donate
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night
